title: Untitled
text:
Elon Musk awarded $1 million to a Wisconsin voter days before a pivotal state Supreme Court race that could flip control to conservatives. Critics say the move, tied to a petition and similar to past payouts, aims to sway the outcome.

Democrats called it “corrupt,” noting Tesla has a lawsuit that could reach the court. Musk’s PAC has spent over $17 million backing GOP candidate Brad Schimel in a race already topping $81 million in total spending.

Common Cause’s Jay Heck said: “This is not what a Wisconsin Supreme Court election ought to be decided on.”
